研究发现考虑性别可提高心力衰竭 CMR 生物标志物的精确度和预后性能研究人员调查了性别对心力衰竭（HF）诊断中左心室充盈压（LVFP）的心脏磁共振（CMR）评估的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-finds-accounting-for-sex-improves- precision-and-prognostic-performance-of-CMR-biomarkers-for-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-finds-accounting-for-sex-improves- precision-and-prognostic-performance-of-CMR-biomarkers-for-heart-failure.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af494145-2fab-4916-99dc-12d9f311fdba Fri, 17 May 2024 12:21:00 -0400 Study finds accounting for sex improves precision and prognostic performance of CMR biomarkers for heart failure
血液中的蛋白质可以在人们诊断出癌症之前七年多向人们发出癌症警告英国研究人员利用观察和遗传学方法对英国生物银行的参与者调查了 1,463 种血浆蛋白与 19 种癌症之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Proteins-in-the-blood-could-warn-people-of-cancer-more-than-seven-years-before-it-is-diagnosed。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Proteins-in-the-blood-could-warn-people-of-cancer-more-than-seven-years-before-it-is-diagnosed。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2283578-c5e3-428e-8a3b-97812c7c805b Fri, 17 May 2024 11:36:00 -0400 Proteins in the blood could warn people of cancer more than seven years before it is diagnosed

FDA 批准 Nova 的 Stat Profile Prime Plus 分析仪用于微毛细管样品模式Nova Biomedical 很高兴地宣布美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 已批准 Stat Profile Prime Plus® 重症监护分析仪上的微毛细管样本模式使用 510(k) 许可。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/FDA-clears-Novae28099s-Stat-Profile-Prime-Plus-analyzer-for-micro-capillary-sample-mode.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/FDA-clears-Novae28099s-Stat-Profile-Prime-Plus-analyzer-for-micro-capillary-sample-mode.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c4da5da-d711-4fad-bf29-04fb4efb322a Fri, 17 May 2024 08:48:00 -0400 FDA clears Nova’s Stat Profile Prime Plus analyzer for micro capillary sample mode

研究表明社交媒体的高使用率与青少年吸烟和吸电子烟的增加有关年轻人使用社交媒体平台以及吸烟和电子烟的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-links-high-social-media-use-to-increased-smoking-and-vaping-among-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-links-high-social-media-use-to-increased-smoking-and-vaping-among-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b09664b3-2ab9-4f93-a2c0-65746d576ccf Fri, 17 May 2024 07:11:00 -0400 Study links high social media use to increased smoking and vaping among youth
专科医学的诱惑将执业护士从初级保健中拉出来对于许多患者来说，看执业护士已成为初级保健的常规部分，其中这些“护士”经常执行与患者依赖医生相同的任务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/The-lure-of-specialty-medicine-pulls-nurse-practitioners-from-primary-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/The-lure-of-specialty-medicine-pulls-nurse-practitioners-from-primary-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8950941e-e73c-4dc4-90a5-10419ca9c34f Fri, 17 May 2024 07:00:26 -0400 The lure of specialty medicine pulls nurse practitioners from primary care

In some states, they might not be legal.

H5N1 禽流感毒株传染给魁北克海豹，引发人畜共患恐慌研究描述了魁北克灰海豹和斑海豹因高致病性甲型禽流感 (H5N1) 病毒株而异常死亡，引发了人们对潜在人畜共患病蔓延的担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/H5N1-avian-flu-strain-jumps-to-seals-in-Quebec-raise-zoonotic-fears.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/H5N1-avian-flu-strain-jumps-to-seals-in-Quebec-raise-zoonotic-fears.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ccf89770-eee6-49f6-8803-cd42920974e4 Fri, 17 May 2024 01:29:00 -0400 H5N1 avian flu strain jumps to seals in Quebec, raising zoonotic fears
